price_groups_grid.name: Name
price_groups_grid.fields_list: The following fields are linked to this price group

delete.question: Are you sure you want to remove the price group "{0}"?

tariffs_grid.name: Name
tariffs_grid.intervals_hint: For more flexible pricing, you can specify time intervals for the tariff. Each interval will need to specify its own price according to the tariff (for example, during peak hours, you can set the price higher). If your pricing does not depend on the time of day, specify one interval equal to the operation mode of the facility.

delete.question: Are you sure you want to remove the tariff "{0}"?

tariffs_grid.promo_codes_hint: You can add promotional codes to the tariff that will allow to get a discount on booking fields. The discount value can be fixed and relative (% of the price).
tariffs_grid.tariff_intervals_warning: The specified intervals do not cover the entire operating mode of the object. Missed slots will not be available for pricing and bookings. Are you sure you want to continue?

prices.message_line1: Here you can set the price values for each time interval for active tariffs and fields.
prices.message_line2: Please note that some fields may be grouped into price groups (the set price will apply to all fields with the specified price group)
prices.message_line3: Links with empty prices will not be displayed in the booking module.
prices.promo_code_hint: Enter promo code to view prices with promo code
